querySelector: query nodes inside animating node (optional, if not present inject just returns animation node)

variantKey1: value to apply if selected variant is variantKey1
variantKey2: value to apply if selected variant is variantKey2, etc.

enter: value to apply if animation declared in `animate` property and current animation is enter
exit: value to apply if animation declared in `animate` property and current animation is exit

source.note: source can also be a single object

element: element to remove style properties from (animating element by default)
